headline: After Plunging -7.57% in 4 Weeks, Here's Why the Trend Might Reverse for Constellation Brands (STZ)
summary: The heavy selling pressure might have exhausted for Constellation Brands (STZ) as it is technically in oversold territory now. In addition to this technical measure, strong agreement among Wall Street analysts in revising earnings estimates higher indicates that the stock is ripe for a trend reversal.

raw.headline: After Plunging -7.57% in 4 Weeks, Here's Why the Trend Might Reverse for Constellation Brands (STZ)

headline: How Jimmy Carter Sparked America’s Craft Beer Industry
summary: Former President Jimmy Carter played an important role in the creation of today's booming craft beer industry. Craft beer’s roots trace back to underground home brewing, which was legalized with a stroke of the pen by Carter in 1978.

raw.headline: How Jimmy Carter Sparked America’s Craft Beer Industry
raw.summary: Former President Jimmy Carter played an important role in the creation of today's booming craft beer industry. Craft beer’s roots trace back to underground home brewing, which was legalized with a stroke of the pen by Carter in 1978.

headline: Modelo Brewer Constellation Brands Awaits Fateful Decision on Tariffs
summary: Few major U.S. corporations would be as clearly affected by tariffs on Mexico as  Constellation Brands  which sells the imported Modelo, Corona and Pacifico beer brands in the U.S.  It is tempting to think then that the stock could be in for quite a bounce if President-elect  Donald Trump  doesn’t ultimately make good on his threat of 25% tariffs for Mexico and Canada.  After all, the Mexican brands that make up Constellation’s beer business accounted for 82% of the company’s net sales in its fiscal year ended in February 2024.
